snippet.title: Elteria Adventures Trailer - 2020
snippet.description:
In Elteria Adventures, you travel the fully changeable voxel-based world of floating islands, while fighting unique monsters and players, searching for artifacts and building houses.  We are building literally ground-breaking action-adventure MMO where everything turns around players interacting with the world. Explore islands, craft powerful artifacts, fight bosses, all while altering the landscape around! Or join with your friends in PvP or PvE battlegrounds on maps you can build yourself! 


Follow Elteria Adventures: 
► Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/j5rFRtF
► Website: https://elteria.game/
► Steam Store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/744200/Elteria_Adventures/
► Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ElteriaGame/
► Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/elteriagame
► Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/elteriagame
► Subscribe to our channel: http://bit.ly/ElteriaYoutube
